title: (Wed Full Show) Eddie's Clear The List For His Son's Sports Team + The Best Scary Movies Of All Time + Crazy Animal Attacks
itunes:title: (Wed Full Show) Eddie's Clear The List For His Son's Sports Team + The Best Scary Movies Of All Time + Crazy Animal Attacks
description:
Eddie is coaching his son's sports teams and has a list he would like people to clear like Lunchbox did a few weeks ago. He shares what's on that list and we discuss if we think it's a good idea for him to ask for help clearing this list or not. Plus, it's spooky season so we're sharing a survey of the 'Top 5 Scariest Movies Of All Time' according to science, and we go around the room and name our scariest movie. Then, listeners call in to share their crazy stories about getting attacked from an animal!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
